capabilities.name: get_booted_sim_id
capabilities.description: Get the ID of the currently booted iOS simulator

capabilities.name: ui_describe_all
capabilities.description: Describes accessibility information for the entire screen in the iOS Simulator

capabilities.name: ui_tap
capabilities.description: Tap on the screen in the iOS Simulator

capabilities.name: ui_type
capabilities.description: Input text into the iOS Simulator

capabilities.name: ui_swipe
capabilities.description: Swipe on the screen in the iOS Simulator

capabilities.name: ui_describe_point
capabilities.description: Returns the accessibility element at given co-ordinates on the iOS Simulator's screen

capabilities.name: screenshot
capabilities.description: Takes a screenshot of the iOS Simulator

capabilities.name: record_video
capabilities.description: Records a video of the iOS Simulator using simctl directly

capabilities.name: stop_recording
capabilities.description: Stops the simulator video recording using killall
